description: An entry point Flutter application with a simple MaterialApp and a stateful home page displaying a progress message.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Flutter app, setting up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a customizable title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI state for MyHomePage, constructing the scaffold and content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each of the widget classes: MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
